exercises.name: Push-Ups
exercises.instructions: Start in plank, lower chest to floor, keep body straight. Push up to start position.

exercises.name: Bench Press
exercises.instructions: Lie on bench, grip barbell wide. Lower to chest, elbows 45°. Press up fully.

exercises.name: Incline Dumbbell Press
exercises.instructions: Lie on incline bench, hold dumbbells. Lower to chest, elbows bent. Press up.

exercises.name: Chest Flyes
exercises.instructions: Lie on flat bench, hold dumbbells. Extend arms out, bring together above chest.

exercises.name: Cable Crossovers
exercises.instructions: Stand between cables, pull handles to chest center. Keep arms slightly bent.

exercises.name: Decline Push-Ups
exercises.instructions: Feet on bench, hands on floor. Lower chest to floor, push back up.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Bench Press
exercises.instructions: Lie on flat bench, hold dumbbells. Lower to chest, press up to full extension.

exercises.name: Pec Deck Fly
exercises.instructions: Sit on pec deck, grip handles. Bring arms together, squeeze chest.

exercises.name: Incline Push-Ups
exercises.instructions: Hands on bench, body in plank. Lower chest to bench, push up.

exercises.name: Wide-Grip Bench Press
exercises.instructions: Lie on bench, grip barbell extra wide. Lower to chest, press up slowly.

exercises.name: Chest Dips
exercises.instructions: Lean forward on bars, lower body until elbows at 90°. Push back up.

exercises.name: Incline Cable Fly
exercises.instructions: Lie on incline bench, pull cables from low to high over chest.

exercises.name: Pull-Ups
exercises.instructions: Grip bar, pull body up until chin above bar. Lower slowly.

exercises.name: Bent-Over Row
exercises.instructions: Bend at hips, grip barbell. Pull to waist, keep back straight. Lower.

exercises.name: Lat Pulldown
exercises.instructions: Sit, grip bar wide. Pull to chest, squeeze shoulder blades. Return slowly.

exercises.name: Seated Cable Row
exercises.instructions: Sit, grip handle, pull to waist. Keep back straight, squeeze shoulder blades.

exercises.name: Deadlift
exercises.instructions: Stand over bar, grip, lift to hips. Keep back straight, lower slowly.

exercises.name: Single-Arm Dumbbell Row
exercises.instructions: One hand on bench, row dumbbell to waist. Keep back flat, switch sides.

exercises.name: T-Bar Row
exercises.instructions: Grip handles, pull to chest. Keep back straight, squeeze shoulder blades.

exercises.name: Superman
exercises.instructions: Lie face down, lift arms and legs off ground. Hold, then lower.

exercises.name: Face Pull
exercises.instructions: Pull cable rope to face, elbows high. Squeeze shoulder blades, return slowly.

exercises.name: Reverse Fly
exercises.instructions: Bend forward, lift dumbbells out to sides. Squeeze shoulder blades, lower.

exercises.name: Squats
exercises.instructions: Stand, bar on shoulders. Squat until thighs parallel, keep back straight. Stand up.

exercises.name: Lunges
exercises.instructions: Step forward, lower back knee to ground. Push back to start, switch legs.

exercises.name: Leg Press
exercises.instructions: Sit on leg press, push platform away. Lower until knees at 90°, extend.

exercises.name: Deadlifts
exercises.instructions: Grip bar, lift to hips, keep back straight. Lower slowly to ground.

exercises.name: Calf Raises
exercises.instructions: Stand, raise heels off ground, hold at top. Lower slowly.

exercises.name: Bulgarian Split Squats
exercises.instructions: Rear foot on bench, lunge forward. Lower front thigh to parallel, return.

exercises.name: Step-Ups
exercises.instructions: Step onto bench, drive through heel. Step down, switch legs.

exercises.name: Leg Extensions
exercises.instructions: Sit, extend legs until straight. Lower weight slowly, keep control.

exercises.name: Hamstring Curls
exercises.instructions: Lie on curl machine, curl legs toward glutes. Lower slowly.

exercises.name: Goblet Squat
exercises.instructions: Hold dumbbell at chest, squat until thighs parallel. Stand up straight.

exercises.name: Overhead Press
exercises.instructions: Stand, grip bar at shoulders. Press overhead, fully extend arms. Lower.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Lateral Raise
exercises.instructions: Stand, lift dumbbells to shoulder height. Keep arms slightly bent, lower.

exercises.name: Front Raise
exercises.instructions: Stand, lift dumbbells to shoulder height in front. Lower slowly.

exercises.name: Arnold Press
exercises.instructions: Sit, palms facing in. Press dumbbells up, rotate palms out. Lower.

exercises.name: Rear Delt Fly
exercises.instructions: Bend forward, lift dumbbells out to sides. Squeeze rear delts, lower.

exercises.name: Upright Row
exercises.instructions: Stand, pull bar to chest, elbows high. Keep bar close, lower.

exercises.name: Seated Dumbbell Press
exercises.instructions: Sit, press dumbbells overhead. Fully extend arms, lower to shoulders.

exercises.name: Cable Lateral Raise
exercises.instructions: Pull cable to shoulder height with one arm. Lower slowly, switch.

exercises.name: Pike Push-Ups
exercises.instructions: Pike position, lower head to floor. Push back up, keep core tight.

exercises.name: Shrugs
exercises.instructions: Stand, hold dumbbells, shrug shoulders up. Hold briefly, lower.

exercises.name: Bicep Curls
exercises.instructions: Stand, curl dumbbells to shoulders. Keep elbows fixed, lower slowly.

exercises.name: Tricep Dips
exercises.instructions: Lower body until elbows at 90°. Push up, keep body straight.

exercises.name: Hammer Curls
exercises.instructions: Stand, curl dumbbells with palms facing in. Lower slowly, keep control.

exercises.name: Skull Crushers
exercises.instructions: Lie on bench, lower bar to forehead. Extend arms, keep elbows fixed.

exercises.name: Preacher Curls
exercises.instructions: Sit at preacher bench, curl bar to shoulders. Lower slowly.

exercises.name: Tricep Pushdowns
exercises.instructions: Push cable bar down, extend arms. Keep elbows fixed, return slowly.

exercises.name: Concentration Curls
exercises.instructions: Sit, curl dumbbell with elbow on thigh. Lower slowly, switch arms.

exercises.name: Overhead Tricep Extension
exercises.instructions: Hold dumbbell overhead, lower behind head. Extend arms, keep elbows fixed.

exercises.name: Chin-Ups
exercises.instructions: Grip bar palms facing you, pull up to chin. Lower slowly.

exercises.name: Cable Bicep Curl
exercises.instructions: Pull cable bar to shoulders, keep elbows fixed. Lower slowly.

exercises.name: Plank
exercises.instructions: Hold forearm plank, keep body straight. Engage core, hold for 30 seconds.

exercises.name: Crunches
exercises.instructions: Lie on back, lift shoulders off ground. Engage abs, lower slowly.

exercises.name: Russian Twists
exercises.instructions: Sit, lean back, twist torso side to side with ball. Keep feet up.

exercises.name: Leg Raises
exercises.instructions: Lie on back, lift legs to 90°. Lower slowly, keep core tight.

exercises.name: Bicycle Crunches
exercises.instructions: Lie on back, alternate elbow to opposite knee. Keep core engaged.

exercises.name: Mountain Climbers
exercises.instructions: In plank, drive knees to chest alternately. Keep core tight, move quickly.

exercises.name: Hanging Leg Raise
exercises.instructions: Hang from bar, raise legs to 90°. Lower slowly, control movement.

exercises.name: Side Plank
exercises.instructions: Lie on side, hold body up on forearm. Keep straight, hold 30 seconds.

exercises.name: Ab Rollouts
exercises.instructions: Kneel, roll wheel forward, extend body. Pull back using core.

exercises.name: Dead Bug
exercises.instructions: Lie on back, extend opposite arm/leg. Alternate sides, keep core tight.

exercises.name: Push-Ups
exercises.instructions: Start in plank, lower chest to floor, push up. Keep body straight.

exercises.name: Overhead Press
exercises.instructions: Press bar from shoulders to overhead, extend arms. Lower slowly.

exercises.name: Bench Press
exercises.instructions: Lie on bench, lower bar to chest. Press up to full extension.

exercises.name: Tricep Dips
exercises.instructions: Lower body until elbows at 90°. Push up, keep body straight.

exercises.name: Incline Push-Ups
exercises.instructions: Hands on bench, lower chest to bench. Push back up.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Lateral Raise
exercises.instructions: Lift dumbbells to shoulder height, arms slightly bent. Lower slowly.

exercises.name: Tricep Pushdowns
exercises.instructions: Push cable bar down, extend arms. Keep elbows fixed.

exercises.name: Pike Push-Ups
exercises.instructions: Pike position, lower head to floor. Push up, keep core tight.

exercises.name: Chest Dips
exercises.instructions: Lean forward, lower until elbows at 90°. Push up.

exercises.name: Seated Dumbbell Press
exercises.instructions: Sit, press dumbbells overhead. Extend arms, lower to shoulders.

exercises.name: Pull-Ups
exercises.equipment: Grip bar, pull body up to chin above barbell. Lower slowly.

exercises.name: Bent-Over Row
exercises.instructions: Bend at hips, pull barbell to waist. Keep back straight, lower slowly.

exercises.name: Lat Pulldown
exercises.instructions: Sit, grip bar wide, pull to chest. Squeeze shoulder blades, return slowly.

exercises.name: Bicep Curls
exercises.instructions: Stand, curl dumbbells to shoulders. Keep elbows fixed, lower slowly.

exercises.name: Seated Cable Row
exercises.instructions: Sit, pull handle to waist. Keep back straight, squeeze shoulder blades.

exercises.name: Chin-Ups
exercises.difficulty: Grip bar palms facing you, pull up to chin. Lower slowly.
exercises.instructions: Pull up to chin, lower slowly.

exercises.name: Face Pull
exercises.instructions: Pull cable rope handle to face, elbows high. Squeeze shoulder blades, return slowly.

exercises.name: Reverse Fly
exercises.instructions: Bend forward, lift dumbbells out to sides. Squeeze shoulder blades, lower.

exercises.name: Single-Arm Dumbbell Row
exercises.instructions: One hand on bench, row dumbbell to waist. Keep back flat, switch sides.

exercises.name: Hammer Curls
exercises.instructions: Stand, curl dumbbells with palms facing in. Lower slowly, keep control.
